casebody.data:
Francis Martinelli v. Marsha Martinelli (11441)

Dupont, C. J., O’Connell and Schaller, Js.

Argued June 7 decision released June 29, 1993 Arnold M. Potash, with whom, on the brief, was Jeffrey D. Ginzberg, for the appellant (defendant). Paul J. Yamin, with whom, on the brief, was Joseph P. Yamin, law student intern, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
